snippet: A revised version of the 2000 musical “Bare,” about teenagers wrestling with religion and sexuality, is getting a new Off Broadway revival at New World Stages.
abstract: Damon Intrabartolo and Jon Hartmere's pop opera Bare, which was quite edgy when it premiered in 2000, has been retooled to reflect today's more tolerant attitudes toward homosexuality for a revival at New World Stages.
lead_paragraph: A revised version of the 2000 musical “Bare,” about teenagers wrestling with religion and sexuality, is getting a new Off Broadway revival at New World Stages.

headline.main: A Musical Makes Changes as Closets Open
